name: WireGuard
short_description: Fast, modern VPN with state-of-the-art cryptography.
description: Fast, modern VPN with state-of-the-art cryptography. WireGuard is a self-hosted application focused on network, security, vpn, privacy. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host WireGuard on your home server to fast, modern vpn with state-of-the-art cryptography without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use WireGuard to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
